docna.cdata!:
Brazil - Vocational Training Project : Loan
            1452 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Brazil - Vocational Training
            Project : Loan 1452 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of the construction
            and/or furnishing and equipping of industrial training
            centers, commercial training centers, hotel training
            schools, occupational safety and health training centers,
            and rural mobile training units; staff training for
            instructors, supervisors and administrators; preparation of
            instructional material; technical assistance in the form of
            specialists' services and fellowships; manpower
            studies; and creation and staffing of the Project Unit.
